name: DISABILITY AND REHABILITATION RESEARCH COALITION
description: Advance policies related to disability and rehabilitation science.
sampleDescriptions: Implementation of S.800/H.R.1631, Enhancing the Stature and Visibility of Medical Rehabilitation Research at the NIH Act; NIH rehab issues; appropriations for rehabilitation research.
